input.sentences: today we celebrated my sisters birthday .
the three of us girls got together for the first time for a long time .
we met up at my parents house for the celebration .
we even brought the kids along for the festivities .
i just wish my daughter was more enthusiastic about being here .
output.sentences: The sisters were together to celebrate their birthdays.
It was a great time with just the girls.
Our parents met us at the house.
The kids joined in the festivities and brought homemade gifts.
At the end of the day my daughter was not as enthusiastic.
